= Helpful Commands =
- phone
	- ifuse ~/iPhone _mounts /var/root/Media/_
	- ifuse --documents [appid] [dir] _mounts documents folder of app (like vlc)_
		- ideviceinstaller -l _gets appids_
		- vlc: org.videolan.vlc-ios
		- vox: com.coppertino.VoxMobile
- printer
	- lpadmin -p [name] -E -v socket://[ip] -m [driver] _configure printer_
	- lpoptions -d [name] _set default printer_
	- lpstat -s / lpstat -p [name] _check status_
	- lpr [file] _print file_
	- lpq _check queue_
- bluetooth
	- id: 70:26:05:AB:97:76
	- bluetoothctl -> pair [id]; connect [id]
	- mpris-proxy for media controls
- audio files:
	- fd -t f -e flac -x ffmpeg -i "{}" -qscale:a 0 "{.}.mp3"
	- shnsplit file.cue -t %n-%t -o flac file.flac
- touchpad:
	- xinput enable/disable "ELAN0406:00 04F3:30A6 Touchpad"
- buttons:
	- volume: pactl set-sink-volume [volume]
	- brightness: sudo light -S [brightness]
